comments.content: A reworked [Crank 8](http://web.archive.org/web/20111216181501/http:/vllg.com/Lux/Crank8/mudTyper+Weights). You can see SyFy Sans [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20111216181501/http:/www.proudcreative.com/pr_syfy_01.html).

I work at Proud and we commissioned Village to make a custom version for the channel. Not available I am afraid though as said already it's close to Crank 8.

[www.gradiate.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20111216181501/http:/www.gradiate.co.uk/ "www.gradiate.co.uk")
